Title: Relates to third-party identity verification service reporting
Summary: Requires the department of transportation to collect data from third-party identification verification services used by airline passengers for expedited security screening in public-use airports and submit a quarterly report to the governor, the temporary president of the senate and the speaker of the assembly containing such data; defines terms.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the transportation law, in relation to third-party identity verification service reporting
